name: MEC Fusion Shorty Wetsuit - Men's
description:
One-piece coverage for paddling in warmer water and weather. This shory wetsuit keeps your torso insulated without cooling gaps or bulky overlaps at your waist. The Fusion series combines years of materials development with sophisticated patterning to produce neoprene wear that’s more comfortable to wear while you are active and warmer in the water if you swim.Superstretch neoprene provides maximum comfort, fit, and mobility.Patterning allows mobility when paddling or swimming.

Body fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
